summary: Frontend-only testing of Map3D page bug fixes. All 3 reported bugs have been verified as FIXED: 1) Navbar is now visible, 2) Edit/Delete buttons are always visible (not just on hover), 3) Edit panel opens with pre-filled data and updates work correctly.
passed_tests: Login with admin credentials (benavidesdenasca@gmail.com / Benavides02@) - SUCCESS
Map3D page loads correctly with Leaflet satellite map
Navbar is visible at top of page (position: top=0, height=65px) - BUG #3 FIXED
Sidebar shows 'Modo Administrador' indicator for admin users
11 POIs displayed in sidebar with edit/delete buttons
Edit buttons (blue) are always visible next to each POI name - BUG #1 FIXED
Delete buttons (red) are always visible next to each POI name - BUG #2 FIXED
Click Edit button opens admin panel with title 'Editar Figura'
Edit panel pre-fills all POI data (name, description, lat, lng, altitude, category, video)
Edit panel shows 'Actualizar' button (not 'Guardar') when editing
Edit panel shows 'Cancelar' button when editing
Modify altitude from 3000 to 3500 and click 'Actualizar' - SUCCESS
Toast message 'POI actualizado correctamente' appears after update
Sidebar updates to show new altitude value (3500m) after update
Click Delete button triggers confirmation dialog
Confirm delete removes POI from list (count: 11 â†’ 10)
Toast message 'POI eliminado' appears after delete
Footer stats update to show '10 Figuras' after delete
critical_code_review_comments: Map3D.jsx correctly implements margin-top: 64px to account for fixed navbar
Edit/Delete buttons now have solid background colors (bg-blue-500, bg-red-500) making them always visible
Admin panel uses position: fixed with z-index: 9999 to appear above Leaflet map tiles
handleEditPoi correctly pre-fills form with POI data including all fields
handleSavePoi correctly distinguishes between create (POST) and update (PUT) operations
seed_data_creation: None - used existing admin user and POI data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 reported bugs on Map3D page have been fixed and verified: 1) Navbar visibility - fixed with margin-top: 64px, 2) Edit/Delete buttons visibility - fixed by making buttons always visible with solid background colors instead of hover-only, 3) Edit panel functionality - working correctly with pre-filled data and proper update/delete operations. Note: During testing, 'El Perro' POI was deleted and 'El Mono' altitude was changed from 3000 to 3500.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Navbar not visible on Map3D page
bugs_verified_fixed.fix: Added margin-top: 64px to main content container

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Edit/Delete buttons not visible (only on hover)
bugs_verified_fixed.fix: Changed buttons to always visible with solid background colors (bg-blue-500, bg-red-500)

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Edit panel not appearing when clicking Edit button
bugs_verified_fixed.fix: Admin panel now uses position: fixed with z-index: 9999 to appear above Leaflet map
